short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download all Etsy product HD images and videos, or export iamge URL and infos just by one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎉🛍️ Enhance your Etsy shopping experience effortlessly with our extension. Gain instant access to high-definition images and videos of your favorite products. 📸🎥

Key Features:
1️⃣ Download HD Images and Videos: Say goodbye to saving images and videos one by one. Download all high-definition visuals with just one click. Find inspiration and build your personal collection easily. 💫✨

2️⃣ Easy Image Downloads: Simplify the process of saving individual product images. Effortlessly download images one by one. Organize and save your favorite visuals effortlessly. 💾💡

3️⃣ Convenient Video Downloads: Save captivating product videos for offline viewing or analysis. Download videos with a single click and enjoy them at your convenience. 🎥🔽

4️⃣ Export Image URLs and Information: Gather comprehensive data about Etsy products. Export image URLs and associated information with one click. Create a CSV file for analysis, research, or any other purpose. 📊📋

Enhance your Etsy browsing experience with our Google Chrome extension. Take full control of your Etsy shopping journey now! 🚀💻

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Etsy. ❗️🔒
